title: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom
Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom
notes: Small amount of slowdown and input lag, even on lowest settings

title: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom

notes: I guess gold is the correct choice, the game works great but it won't go into fullscreen.  If you switch to fullscreen it drops to the toolbar and won't come back up.  Other than that it runs perfect as far as I can tell.  However this issue keeps it from being Platinum (I think some people need to understand that platinum means it's perfect out of the box).
title: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom

notes: One of my PC's this works out of the box so I would almost give it a Platinum until I tried it on my second machine. My second machine experienced the screen stuck in the taskbar. The only workaround I found for that is to change the resolution down, back up to what I want, and then change to fullscreen. Otherwise it gets stuck in the window menu.
title: Ni no Kuni™ II: Revenant Kingdom
